content: project that sends hand knit and crochet wool projects to bring comfort and warmth to afghan women men and children who continue to suffer from oppression war hunger poverty and sickness every year a different campaign is launched with required projects and sizes based on current need for more information and to see the current campaign visit http //www afghansforafghans org 3
